name: validate_data
body: let old_pub = ctx . accounts . rec . data_pub ;
let new_pub = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;
msg ! ("Case 107: data_pub changed from {} to {}" , old_pub , new_pub) ;

name: fractionalize
attributes: # [doc = " NFT をフラクショナル化して分割トークンをミントするが、"]
# [doc = " has_one = fraction_mint のみ検証し、アカウントの所有者（owner）とは照合していない"]
body: let frac_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . fraction_account ;
frac_acc . total_fractions = frac_acc . total_fractions . checked_add (fraction_amount) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . fraction_mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_fraction_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . mint_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

name: defractionalize
attributes: # [doc = " 分割トークンをバーンして NFT を再構築するが、"]
# [doc = " has_one = fraction_mint のみ検証し、アカウントの所有者（owner）とは照合していない"]
body: let frac_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . fraction_account ;
frac_acc . total_fractions = frac_acc . total_fractions . checked_sub (burn_amount) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . fraction_mint . to_account_info () , from : ctx . accounts . user_fraction_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: user_fraction_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの分割トークン受取 TokenAccount"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: mint_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Mint 権限を持つアカウント"]

fields.name: user_fraction_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの分割トークン保有 TokenAccount"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このフラクショナル化権を所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: fraction_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 対応する分割トークンの Mint"]

fields.name: total_fractions
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでにミントされた分割トークンの総数"]
